data.actual_result: Another X appears to the left of the other X
data.expected_result: There should be no second X
data.short_description: [Edge] When searching the members list, a second X appears in the search box
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can view the members list - Go to Server Settings - Go to Members - Use the bar to search for a member - Observe that a second X appears when you begin to type
